title: Drawing, "Design for a Dixie Cup: Fruits", ca. 1970
medium: Colored markers on white wove paper, taped to bright white paper
description: Semicircular sheet with a register of brightly colored stylized fruits that conforms to the shape of the sheet.  Beginning at left are oranges.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Dixie Cup: Fruits", ca. 1970.
ca. 1970. Colored markers on white wove paper, taped to bright white paper. Gift of Irv Koons. 2011-1-11.
